title: Can I Recycle Plastic Straws? Exploring The Implications And What You ...
body: Plastic straws typically break down after 200 years, but they take 2-6 months on average to decompose. As a result, it creates a large amount of waste that must be properly disposed of. To ensure that these straws are properly disposed of, compost or otherwise dispose of them in a landfill. It is also critical that consumers are made aware of ...
